description:
The whole village has turned out for a music festival. Appearing on stage is... On guitar, Emo Bananya! On drums, Metal Bananya! And on vocals, Vampire Bananya! The festival reaches its climax as everyone gets into their hardcore rhythms, but then it suddenly starts to rain... Nya♪ Nya♪ Nya♪ Nya♪
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ばなにゃとおんがく にゃ
